mapper.select: SELECT e.EMPLOYEEID, e.EMPLOYEELOGINNAME, e.EMPLOYEEREALNAME, e.EMPLOYEEPASSWORD, e.EMPLOYEEDESCRIPTION, e.EMPLOYEEIMG, DATE_FORMAT(e.UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS uploadDate, r.ROLEID, r.ROLENAME, r.ROLEDESCRIPTION FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_ROLE er ON e.EMPLOYEEID = er.EMPLOYEEID LEFT JOIN ROLE r ON er.ROLEID = r.ROLEID WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.EMPLOYEEID = ${employeeId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE 1 = 1
AND e.EMPLOYEEREALNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{employeeRealName}),'%')
SELECT e.EMPLOYEEID, e.EMPLOYEELOGINNAME, e.EMPLOYEEREALNAME, e.EMPLOYEEDESCRIPTION, e.EMPLOYEEIMG, DATE_FORMAT(e.UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS updateDate, FROM EMPLOYEE e

SELECT e.EMPLOYEEID, e.EMPLOYEELOGINNAME, e.EMPLOYEEREALNAME, e.EMPLOYEEPASSWORD, e.EMPLOYEEDESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(e.UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS updateDate, r.ROLEID, r.ROLENAME, r.ROLEDESCRIPTION FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_ROLE er ON e.EMPLOYEEID = er.EMPLOYEEID LEFT JOIN ROLE r ON er.ROLEID = r.ROLEID WHERE e.EMPLOYEELOGINNAME = #{loginName} AND e.EMPLOYEEPASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE(EMPLOYEELOGINNAME, EMPLOYEEREALNAME, EMPLOYEEPASSWORD, EMPLOYEEDESCRIPTION) VALUES ( #{employeeLoginName}, #{employeeRealName}, #{employeePassword}, #{employeeDescription} )
